For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company . Andy Coulson has withstood months of strain over allegations-- which he denies-- that while editor at the News of the World he encouraged reporters to hack the cellphone messages of royals, politicIan Edmondsons and celebrities. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in a statement confirming his resignation. "I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on."
